code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./MoodContent.css';import img1 from'../images/mood_rad.png';import img2 from'../images/mood_good.png';import img3 from'../images/mood_meh.png';import img4 from'../images/mood_bad.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var MoodContent=function MoodContent(mood){var mood_img;if(mood.mood==='rad'){mood_img=img1;}else if(mood.mood==='good'){mood_img=img2;}else if(mood.mood==='meh'){mood_img=img3;}else{mood_img=img4;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"mood/".concat(mood.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:mood_img===img1?'img1':mood_img===img2?'img2':mood_img===img3?'img3':'img4',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"date",children:mood.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:mood_img})]})})});};
